about_the_game:
The Streets Silver pack for Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown includes the following content:
- Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR*
- Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG**
- Lord of the Streets outfit for your avatar
- Streets sticker pack for customizing your cars, compatible with all cars in your garage

* The Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR automatically unlocks in your garage once you reach level 12.
** The Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG automatically unlocks in your garage when you reach level 20.
detailed_description:
The Streets Silver pack for Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown includes the following content:
- Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR*
- Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG**
- Lord of the Streets outfit for your avatar
- Streets sticker pack for customizing your cars, compatible with all cars in your garage

* The Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR automatically unlocks in your garage once you reach level 12.
** The Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG automatically unlocks in your garage when you reach level 20.
